SELECT st.id AS styleId, st.style_no AS bulkStyleNo, st.size_type AS modelType, st.designer AS designer, st.typewriter as patternDesign, st.describe as `describe`, GROUP_CONCAT( hti.type, '(', hti.percentage, ')' ) AS ingredient, ht.* FROM t_style_test st LEFT JOIN t_hang_tag ht ON st.id = ht.style_id LEFT JOIN t_hang_tag_ingredient hti ON ht.id = hti.hang_tag_id
st.del_flag = 0 AND st.company_code = #{companyCode} and ht.id = #{id}
